00074                                                    {
00075         int nrows = data.length;
00076         int ncols = data[0].length;
00077         
00078         // compute fft row-by-row
00079         Complex[][] rowwise = new Complex[nrows][];
00080         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i){
00081             rowwise[i] = FFT.fft(data[i]);
00082         }
00083         
00084         // on the result, compute fft column by column
00085         Complex[][] result = new Complex[nrows][ncols];
00086         {
00087             Complex[] tmp = new Complex[nrows];
00088             for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00089                 for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i){
00090                     tmp[i] = rowwise[i][j];
00091                 }
00092                 Complex[] tmp2 = FFT.fft(tmp);
00093                 for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i){
00094                     result[i][j] = tmp2[i];
00095                 }
00096             }
00097         }
00098         
00099         return result;
00100     }

00018         int nrows = input.length;

00021         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i){
00022             rowwise[i] = FFT.ifft(input[i]);
00023         }
00024         Complex[][] result = new Complex[nrows][ncols];

00027             for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i){
00028                 tmp[i] = rowwise[i][j];
00029             }
00030             Complex[] tmp2 = FFT.ifft(tmp);
